item.title: Power Bank from old Laptop battery
item.description: Quite a lot of people have Old Laptops lying around while majority of the parts are hard to salvage But There is one part which can be used, Battery! In this video, I have Used the Cells to make a power bank which can charge my phone around 6 to 8 times with one charge.
